reuters.title: EATON <ETN> GETS 25 MLN DLR CONTRACT
reuters.body: Eaton Corp said it was awarded a 25 mln dlr contract by the U.S. Customs Service for development of an intelligence system intended to intercept drug smuggling along the southern border of the U.S. The contract calls for the company to provide the government with the most current information gathering and assessment technology available in its fight against border drug trafficking, Eaton said. Reuter 
